snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. apologized to President Recep Tayyip Erdogan for remarks suggesting that Turkey helped facilitate the rise of the Islamic State.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph Biden Jr apologizes to Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan for remarks suggesting that Turkey helped facilitate the rise of Islamic State militant group.
